description: More than 300 acts are to perform at the four day dance music festival in Daresbury in August.
title: Creamfields full line-up unveiled with David Guetta to headline
title_page: Creamfields full line-up unveiled with David Guetta to headline - BBC News
maintext:
David Guetta has been confirmed as a headline act for the upcoming Creamfields festival.
More than 300 artists will perform across 30 stages at the dance music festival in Daresbury, near Runcorn, over the August bank holiday weekend.
Anyma, described as "biggest name in electronic music today" was named as a headliner earlier this month, but organisers have now unveiled the full line-up.
Other high-profile acts include Chase & Status, Martin Garrix, Hardwell, Sonny Fodera, Amelie Lens, Ewan McVicar, Patrick Topping, Jamie Jones, CamelPhat, Eric Prydz, Fatboy Slim, Solardo, and Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike.
